title: The Sims 3: Complete Edition – v1.67.2.024037 + All Add-ons & Content Store Items
body:
The Sims 3: Complete Edition – v1.67.2.024037 + All Add-ons & Content Store Items


Genres/Tags: Artificial life, Managerial, God sim, 3D, Pausable real-time
Companies: Maxis, Electronic Arts
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI21
Original Size: 29.7 GB
Repack Size: 10.8/15.4 GB

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive + 2 (Uploaded by Uria Urikra and hermietkreeft, compatible with torrent)

Special Note About C++ Redist 2005 Error

Apparently Microsoft changed the mirror for downloading C++ Redist 2005 I use in my repacks. Hence the installer will throw an error if you have the “Download and Install” option checked (which is default). So, to avoid this problem, uncheck that option. You can download the installer manually here.

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on v1.67.2.024037 Steam release with removed world caches: 21.3 GB – thanks to anadius!
  • All add-ons are included and activated
  • Complete Content Store Items Collection (8.4 GB) by Games4theworld added
  • Overwatch & ErrorTrap mods, DLC Toggler/Uninstaller and FPS Limiter/3Booter utilities added
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of Complete Content Store Items Collection
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 29.7 to 10.8/15.4 GB)
  • Installation takes (main game without Store Items): ~40 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~1 hour 20 minutes on 4-threads CPU. Installation of Store Items will take another 7-15 minutes
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 22 GB (+9 GB on a system drive in case of installing of Store Items content)
  • If you install the game with Store Items, after installation you must manually check and install all items/worlds/maps you want from the official game launcher (Downloads section in the launcher menu)
  • Use corresponding .REG-files in the “_Language Changer” folder to change the game language
  • You can manually copy Overwatch & ErrorTrap mods from _Mods folder after installation in case of problems
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Create the lives you’ve always wanted!

Ready to live a freer, more creative life? In The Sims� 3, you can let your fantasies run wild as you design your ideal world. Start with your Sim, refining each shape, color and personality trait until you get the precise person that pleases you. Design your dream home, but don�t let a grid limit you; place, rotate and stack furniture and walls freely and to your heart�s content.

Once the �hard work� is over, it�s time to be a mentor. Guide your Sim�s path through life, developing a career, finding love, and pursuing dreams and desires. Spending time with friends and family is just as important as mastering painting or accumulating knowledge.

Take things to the next level and record movies of your Sim�s adventures and share them with the ever-growing and thriving community. With a huge catalog of expansion packs and fun objects to discover, there is no end to the possibilities awaiting you. It all begins here; your adventure awaits!

Game Features

  • Customize Your Sim: Mix and match a vast range of facial features and body types to get the look you want. Infuse your Sim with personality traits and help realize their dreams.
  • Stage Your Own Extreme Makeover: Decorate your Sim�s home however you want, neat or messy. Use odd angles, create tall stacks of items, and apply your favorite self-made pattern to the walls and floors.
  • Range From the Home: Get out of the house and explore the lively and entertaining neighborhood for the first time. Be a part of the larger online community!

Included content:

  • Base Game v1.67.2.024037 (Steam)
  • The Sims 3: 70s 80s & 90s Stuff
  • The Sims 3: Ambitions
  • The Sims 3: Diesel Stuff
  • The Sims 3: Fast Lane Stuff
  • The Sims 3: Generations
  • The Sims 3: High End Loft Stuff
  • The Sims 3: Into the Future
  • The Sims 3: Island Paradise
  • The Sims 3: Katy Perry Sweet Treats
  • The Sims 3: Late Night
  • The Sims 3: Master Suite Stuff
  • The Sims 3: Movie Stuff
  • The Sims 3: Outdoor Living Stuff
  • The Sims 3: Pets
  • The Sims 3: Seasons
  • The Sims 3: Showtime
  • The Sims 3: Supernatural
  • The Sims 3: Town Life Stuff
  • The Sims 3: University Life
  • The Sims 3: World Adventures
  • Complete Content Store Items Collection (63 weeks worth of content)
  • Overwatch & ErrorTrap mods for better game perfomance
  • DLC Toggler/Uninstaller for enabling/disabling/uninstalling of official add-ons
  • FPS Limiter/3Booter utilities for limiting the framerate to 30 FPS

To avoid folder creation problems on specific OS versions, for these 3 languages the repack installer creates those folder in English, while the game expects those folders to be in their specific languages.

So, if you install the game in Japanese, Chinese or Korean AND you install mods and/or Store Items, after installation and BEFORE running the game, go to “C:\Users\Your Username\Documents\Electronic Arts” and rename “The Sims 3” folder to one of these names:
ザ･シムズ３
심즈 3
模擬市民3
